verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God, the ancient of days
breathed stars into space
made the wind and the waves

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
before life began
we were your plan
you made us for love in your holy hands
Our God is Love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah our God is love,
ever ancient ever new
servant king and mighty saviour
we proclaim our God is love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
God we lift you high
you chose the cross and gave us life
you rose from the grave you made a way
with all of my life i'll give you praise
Our God is love x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
with one voice we will proclaim
you are God your love remains (x2)
